message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this item which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $120 for it. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my budget, I can only offer $140 for the product. Let me know if this is within your consideration.
